name: Tic Tac Toe Watch 3 In A Row
name_original: Tic Tac Toe Watch 3 In A Row
description:
A classic Tic-Tac-Toe Three In A Row game that runs on your iPhone and your Apple Watch. You are the red apple taking on the slippery snake.

This single player game is fast and fun whether you are playing on your larger screen device or your Watch. The game will keep track of your record so you can see how you are doing over time.

Are you tricky enough to take on the sly snake?
